name: Druin Faust
description:
Druin Faust: Game Jam Edition
A game made for the SodorJam in October 2022
The Theme of this Game Jam was "Zelda Clone"

The Universe has just enough power to bring a being to life, one final time.
You are the last hope all of creation has left for survival.

Controls:

  • Movement: WASD or Arrow Keys
  • Confirm/Attack: Enter or Space or E or Z or X

Programs Used: 

  • Art - Aseprite 1.3 Dev
  • Engine - Godot 4.0 Beta 3
  • Music - Ableton Live 11.2.5
  • SFX - LabChirp 1.60

Credits: 

Zeralith - Art, Programming, Music, SFX, Voice Acting, Story, Writing
